SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.card_number cardNumber, a.sex, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.work_unit workUnit, a.job, a.emergency_contact emergencyContact, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` relationshipName, e.`name` cardTypeName, f.`name` politicName FROM sys_staff_family a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.relationship_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary e ON a.card_type = e.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary f ON a.politic_id = f.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id
AND b.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND b.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'
AND a.`name` LIKE '%${name}%'
AND a.work_unit LIKE '%${workUnit}%'
AND b.state = #{state}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_staff_family (id, relationship_id, `name`, card_type, card_number, sex, work_unit, job, politic_id, emergency_contact, staff_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{relationshipId}, #{name}, #{cardType}, #{cardNumber}, #{sex}, #{workUnit}, #{job}, #{politicId}, #{emergencyContact}, #{staffId}, #{createTime})
